titles.title: Occupational Therapy Mental Health Parity Act
Occupational Therapy Mental Health Parity Act
A bill to clarify coverage of occupational therapy under the Medicare and Medicaid programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Occupational Therapy Mental Health Parity Act
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) to conduct outreach on Medicare coverage of occupational therapy services to treat substance use or mental health disorders. The CMS must also issue guidance on the availability of such services under Medicaid.
